articles.author: Giselle Ruhiyyih Ewing
articles.title: Zelenskyy asks allies to act on reports of North Korean troops helping Russia - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukraine’s president cites reports of up to 12,000 troops training for deployment with Putin’s forces, calls for “firm, concrete response.”
articles.content: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy called on global allies not to "shy away" from responding to reports that Pyongyang is supplying troops to help Russia wage war on Ukraine, saying late Tuesday… [+891 chars]
